**Click & Pick: Your Ultimate Color Picker Extension**

Unlock the full spectrum of colors with **Click & Pick**, the intuitive browser extension that allows you to effortlessly select and manage colors from any website you visit. Whether you're a designer, developer, or just a color enthusiast, this lightweight tool simplifies color selection and conversion like never before.

### Key Features:

- **Instant Color Picking:** Just click anywhere on a webpage to grab the color you desire. No more guessing or complicated tools—it's that easy!
  
- **Versatile Color Conversion:** Convert colors between HEX, RGB, and HSL formats with a single click. Perfect for developers needing precise values for their projects.

- **Custom Palette Selector:** Create and manage your own color palette. Save your favorite colors and access them anytime for your design needs.

- **History of Selections:** Never lose a great color again! Click & Pick keeps a record of your recently selected colors for quick reference.

- **User-Friendly Interface:** Designed for ease of use, Click & Pick integrates seamlessly into your browsing experience, making color selection a breeze.

- **Fast-Picker Widget:** You don't need to open the whole extension interface to quickly pick a color on any web-page - use our tiny picker widget in the bottom right corner of the screen to pick a color instantly. The color will be copied to your clipboard. You can adjust the color by clicking on extension icon in the toolbar. If you don't want to see the widget on every web-page you can simply close it with a close button right next to it!

Transform your web experience with Click & Pick—where every color is just a click away! Download now and start your colorful journey today.

** The extension may share exciting news & updates from developers, by opening a page about it in a new tab. If you're not interested - you can close it. We promise to not disturb you too often :)
